Room.Name: Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of another hallway in the caverns below the glacier. One hallway heads west while the other heads north and south.
Room.LongDescription: It has gotten rather dark as you have passed into the rocky surface below the great ice glacier. The sun can no longer illuminate your path and you must resort to torches or magic to proceed. The hallway runs north and south, intersecting another hallway, which heads west.
